title: 70+ T206 's  HOF's  SGC and PSA Group F/S- SOLD!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 70+ T206 's  HOF's  SGC and PSA Group F/S- SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Lance
I am selling a large group of T206's and other vintage sports cards. I am funding a large purchase and would rather sell at a wholesale here rather than wait on Ebay for a week and give up 10-15% to Ebay/Paypal. Do your own research and make me an offer. Scans will be available upon request. I may have to snap some photo's if the scan-zips get too big. Please be patient and I will answer all questions asap. Shipping+insurance will be added to all offers based on the buyers request of carriers. Here we go!

I will entertain offers on the group before selling individually...sorry about the bump.
